about.title: About Us | Grand Residences Riviera Cancun
about.metadescription: A guarantee of excellence with luxurious accommodation and delightful amenities. Enter and Book Now!
about.h1b: Grand Residences Riviera Cancun, the perfect place for the vacation of your dreams
about.descripcion:
Located on a secluded beach in Puerto Morelos, Grand Residences Riviera Cancun is a luxury resort belonging to pioneer Cancun resort group Royal ResortsÂ®.

Find your dream vacation on Mexican Caribbean shores in a luxury family resort where every experience will be a precious memory. Unwind in spacious, elegant suites, savor gourmet dishes, try a new activity every day and explore a world of wonders.
